General.Name: Hunan Keli Motor Co Ltd
General.Description: Keli Motor Group Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of micro motors in China. The company offers servo systems, including servo motors and drives; shaded pole motors; tangential blowers; universal motors; stepper motors; brushless direct current motors; and pump motors. Its products are used in 5G base station, robot, intelligent appliances, medical and health care, industrial automation & internet of things, 3D printer, commercial office, stage lighting, security monitoring, HVAC refrigeration, new energy sector, and electric tool industries. It also exports its products to the United States, Canada, Mexico, Brazil, Germany, Italy, Switzerland, Turkey, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Hunan Keli Motor Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Keli Motor Group Co., Ltd. in May 2019. Keli Motor Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Shenzhen Bay Tech-Eco Park, Shenzhen, China, 518057
